meanings.definition: The act of placing a dead body in a tomb.
meanings.sent1: The entombments of ancient pharaohs were filled with treasures for the afterlife.
meanings.sent2: After the funeral, the entombments of our ancestors were sealed for eternity.
meanings.sent3: The entombments in the cemetery were so quiet, even the ghosts whispered.
meanings.sent4: The entombments of memories in our hearts keep our loved ones alive forever.
meanings.sent5: The entombments of history in the pyramids tell stories of the past.

meanings.definition: The state of being buried in a tomb.
meanings.sent1: The entombments of the deceased were marked with elaborate gravestones.
meanings.sent2: The entombments in the old churchyard were a reminder of our mortality.
meanings.sent3: The entombments under the moonlight seemed almost peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent4: The entombments of forgotten kings lay undisturbed beneath the earth.
meanings.sent5: The entombments of heroes are honored with statues and memorials.
